Meaning: to take out, put out, submit
put in good use, let live
two by two, as a couple
two at a time, in twos
at that time, in those days
to get in, to go in
to put in, to let in
to be prolonged, to drag on
to raise, to lift, to boost
to rise, swell, to be promoted
to hear, to ask, to listen
to be heard, to be audible
to get info　out of a person
to talk about, to speak of
to read out,  to read aloud
